body_html:
Just FYI: There are also two implementations of correlation layer on Github:

  1. https://github.com/sampepose/flownet2-tf/tree/master/src/ops/correlation
  2. https://github.com/jgorgenucsd/corr_tf

Update:
Another one here: https://github.com/simonmeister/UnFlow/blob/8e74f2b33138ab72d775bf1c3a9256105677834e/ops/correlation_op.cu.cc

body:
Just FYI: There are also two implementations of correlation layer on Github:
1. https://github.com/sampepose/flownet2-tf/tree/master/src/ops/correlation
2. https://github.com/jgorgenucsd/corr_tf

Update:
Another one here: https://github.com/simonmeister/UnFlow/blob/8e74f2b33138ab72d775bf1c3a9256105677834e/ops/correlation_op.cu.cc
